meanings.sent1: The hulking elephant struggled to fit through the narrow gate.
meanings.sent2: The hulking bear lumbered through the forest, knocking over trees.
meanings.sent3: The hulking penguin tried to dance ballet, but its size made it comical.
meanings.sent4: The hulking mountain loomed over the tiny village, casting a shadow over everything.
meanings.sent5: The hulking wrestler easily lifted his opponent over his head, showcasing his strength.

meanings.sent1: Carrying the hulking suitcase up the stairs was a real challenge.
meanings.sent2: The hulking ship slowly made its way through the rough waves of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The hulking pumpkin was so heavy that it took two people to lift it.
meanings.sent4: The hulking clouds gathered in the sky, signaling an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The hulking bookshelf filled with books dominated the small room, making it feel crowded.

meanings.definition: Moving in a slow and awkward manner
meanings.sent1: The hulking robot walked with jerky movements, almost tripping over its own feet.
meanings.sent2: The hulking sloth inched along the branch, taking its time to reach the leaves.
meanings.sent3: The hulking giraffe tried to tiptoe quietly, but its long legs made it clumsy.
meanings.sent4: The hulking tortoise raced against the hare, its slow pace surprising everyone.
meanings.sent5: The hulking snail left a shiny trail behind as it moved slowly across the garden.
